text.sentence: Hi Joan, Would you please send me a VPP form for my daughter.
I always forget, what info do you need from me? Thanks!
text.signature: Carmen Peters IHPR (SAC PDC) 916-565-8551 Go Packers! carmen.peters@nissan-usa.com - C.DTF

text.sentence: Hi Carmen, There are (2) VPP forms, one is for "Friends & Extended Family" and the other is for "Employees and Immediate Family."
Usually all I need to know is which form employees need.
Since this is for your daughter, I will send the "Employees and Immediate Family" form.
Hi Joan, I received the form today. Thanks again.
I have some other questions, Can these forms be used at an Infiniti Dealer too?
Also, how many of these can I use in 1 year.
Is it so many for family and so many extended family/friends?
I think I've done one of each so far this year.
Hi Carmen, The VPP form can be used at both Nissan and Infiniti dealers.
The limits under the VPP program are: Employees of NNA and affiliate companies: (4) vehicles per year.
Vehicles may be purchased by employee or immediate family member.
Extended family & friends: (2) vehicles per year.
Employees can pass along savings to friends and family twice a year.
Please let me know if there is anything else you need.
Hi Theresa, Below is the answer to your questions.
Let me know if you get this.
text.signature: Carmen Peters IHPR (SAC PDC) 916-565-8551 Go Packers! carmen.peters@nissan-usa.com
